channel.title: Ankit's UX Excursions!
channel.description: This is Ankit Sarraf's Portfolio website

item.title:
Unsolicited Redesign:
LinkedIn Learning Notebooks
item.description:
As of Nov 26, 2020, LinkedIn Learning is a melting pot for curious minds to explore over 15K Courses in its content library. It is surely an exceptional platform to start the scholarly journey for a plethora of topics offered in multiple languages.

Many organizations have realized the criticality of the professional growth of their workforce. Sponsoring unlimited access to a premium subscription of various Open Online course websites to their employees becomes imperative in such a scenario.

My User Experience 10K ft. View:

For the past couple of weeks, I have been pursuing a few courses on...
